hero.tagline: Websites and web apps – built for your needs

about.title: About us
about.intro: Ojala Solutions is finnish company that builds websites and web applications for companies and organisations in Finland. We focus on clear design, easy use, and customer needs.
about.whoFor: We work with companies and organisations that need a new site or a custom web application.
about.founder: Founder Niilo Ojala has solid experience in web development and real-world projects and a passion for software development.

websites.title: Websites
websites.description: All solutions are designed and built individually — without ready-made templates. Clear, fast and search-engine-friendly websites that are easy to develop further as your needs grow.

webapps.title: Web Applications
webapps.description: Custom web applications and tools. We build solutions tailored to your exact use case and users — nothing unnecessary, only what works.

designSeo.title: Design & SEO
designSeo.description: Visual design, usability and discoverability combined into one cohesive whole. Every project starts with listening — goals, target audience and needs guide the final result.

whyUs.title: Why Ojala Solutions?
whyUs.technology: Modern, fast, and secure solutions built to last.
whyUs.seo: Great websites don’t help if no one finds them. Proper search engine optimization is always part of the design.
whyUs.clientNeeds: No ready-made packages. We build solutions around your goals.

contact.title: Let's talk about your project
contact.subtitle: Share your goals and ideas – you don't need to know exactly what you want. We'll reply soon and with no obligation.

approt.name: Approt.app
approt.description: Digital solution for student bar crawl events. Replaces physical appro-passes with a modern, paperless system that eliminates lost stamps, complex logistics, and long queues.
approt.feature1: Digital appro-passes and QR code scanning

isofan.name: Isofan
isofan.description: Company website for an LVI systems importer specializing in energy-efficient solutions. Features an interactive energy-saving calculator, a comprehensive admin panel, and products.
isofan.feature1: Comprehensive energy-saving calculator with PDF export
